title: Michael Casson, studio potter
brief_description: The stoneware of Michael Casson has won international acclaim. The stages in making one pot are described, and many fine examples of the potter’s completed work are shown in his Buckinghamshire workshop. Casson provides his own commentary: “Pottery is really my whole life”.
